title: Los Angeles Browns
description:
Joon Lee and Buster discuss Joey Votto’s improbable Fenway feat, the Red Sox continuing to struggle, the Mets’ across the board competence, if the Phillies are DEAD OR ALIVE, Derek Jeter joining social media and Colorado’s City Connect uniforms. Then, Todd Radom stops by to deliver the Phantom Franchise and administer the weekly quiz.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Joon Lee on Joey Votto’s improbable Fenway feat, a spiraling Matt Barnes, Derek Jeter joining social media and the Mets' competence. Later, Todd Radom with the Phantom Franchise and quiz
